bonuses.text: Up to five additional free Raid Passes from spinning Gym Photo Discs (for a total of six)
Increased chance of encountering Shiny Raikou from Shadow Raids
The Remote Raid limit will increase to 20 from Friday, January 23, at 4:00 p.m. to Saturday, January 24, 2026, at 7:00 p.m. PST
Eight additional Raid Passes from spinning Gym Photo Discs (for a daily total of 14)
Increased chance to get Rare Candy XL from Raid Battles
50% more XP from Raid Battles
2× Stardust from Raid Battles

ticketBonuses: For US$4.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency), you can purchase a ticket that grants the following bonuses.
These bonuses will be effective on Saturday, January 24, 2026, from 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time.

Trainers will be able to purchase and gift tickets to any of their Pokémon GO friends that they have achieved a Friendship level of Great Friends or higher with. Please note that purchases—including those made for other Trainers—are non-refundable (subject to applicable law and the exceptions set forth in the Terms of Service). Tickets cannot be purchased with PokéCoins.
The Shadow Raikou Raid Day Ultra Ticket Box will be available for US$4.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency) and includes an event ticket and one Premium Battle Pass!
Check it out soon in the Pokémon GO Web Store!

bonuses: * Team GO Rocket Balloons are appearing every 2 hours.

bonuses.text: Additional Candy XL when walking with your Buddy Pokémon
Earn additional hearts with your Buddy Pokémon
Increased chance to encounter Shiny Goldeen
Increased chance to hatch Shiny Goldeen and Shiny Fidough

paragraphs: During the event, the following evolution requirements will be temporarily changed:
Note: These evolution requirements will return to the usual requirements on Sunday, January 25, 2026, at 8:00 p.m. local time.
lists: Eevee → Sylveon: Evolve Eevee into Sylveon after earning 20 hearts with Eevee as your buddy.
Pancham → Pangoro: Evolve Pancham into Pangoro after catching ten Dark-type Pokémon with Pancham as your buddy.
Pawmo → Pawmot: Evolve Pawmo into Pawmot after exploring 5 km with Pawmo as your buddy.

paragraphs: Flamigo, the Synchronize Pokémon, will make its Pokémon GO debut!

Complete the Collection Challenges to receive XP, Stardust, and encounters with event-themed Pokémon.
There will be a free Timed Research opportunity available.
Timed Research rewards include the following.
Please note that Timed Research expires. The tasks associated with this Timed Research must be completed and their rewards must be claimed before February 8, 2026 at 8 pm local time.
For US$4.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency), you’ll be able to access event-exclusive Timed Research.
Timed Research rewards include the following.

Trainers will be able to purchase and gift tickets to any of their Pokémon GO friends that they have achieved a Friendship level of Great Friends or higher with. Please note that purchases—including those made for other Trainers—are non-refundable (subject to applicable law and the exceptions set forth in the Terms of Service). Tickets cannot be purchased with PokéCoins.
Please note that Timed Research expires. The tasks associated with this Timed Research must be completed and their rewards must be claimed before February 8, 2026 at 8 pm local time.

bonusDisclaimers: * While most bonuses are only active during the three hours of the event (2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time), these bonuses will be active from 2:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m. local time.
The three-hour Incense bonus excludes Daily Adventure Incense and the one-hour Lure bonus excludes Golden Lure Modules.

bonuses: The following bonuses will be active during the event.

details.description: Trainers will automatically receive GO Pass: January on Tuesday, January 6, at 10:00 a.m. local time. You can collect GO Points and rank up to get additional rewards through Tuesday, February 3, at 10:00 a.m. local time.

exclusiveBonuses: Attendees will receive the following bonuses and rewards anywhere in Tainan during event hours on their ticketed day:
You can make the most of your event day with ticket add-ons! Check out the Raid Lover, Egg-thusiast, and Citywide Gameplay add-ons!

ticketAddOns: As optional bonuses for attendees, we’re offering several add-ons. Please note: it’s possible to add these to your ticket after your initial order, so if you can’t decide right away, you can always come back to purchase an add-on later!

Extend the GO Tour fun and enjoy a city experience throughout Tainan on the extra event day—or days—of your choice! This add-on provides an additional day of the citywide gameplay experience that is available on your primary event day, with a few restrictions.
These add-ons only enable additional citywide gameplay. The Tainan Metropolitan Park event experience is only available on your primary event day at the time indicated on your ticket.
Trainers will have access to the event’s wild Pokémon encounters, Incense encounters, and Eggs, plus access to event Field Research, Timed Research, and special bonuses.
Restrictions for the Citywide Gameplay add-ons apply. Trainers will only receive the ticketed event Special Research, Timed Research, and Masterwork Research once.

For the first time ever, a new nighttime event experience at Pokémon GO Tour is available as an add-on to your main event ticket. Mega Night is a ticketed evening event taking place after the main daytime Pokémon GO Tour event. Look forward to unique gameplay, special entertainment, and more during this “after hours” extravaganza!

Extend the GO Tour fun and enjoy a city experience throughout Tainan on the extra event day—or days—of your choice! This add-on provides an additional day of the citywide gameplay experience that is available on your primary event day, with a few restrictions.
These add-ons only enable additional citywide gameplay. The Tainan Metropolitan Park event experience is only available on your primary event day at the time indicated on your ticket.
Trainers will have access to the event’s wild Pokémon encounters, Incense encounters, and Eggs, plus access to event Field Research, Timed Research, and special bonuses.
Restrictions for the Citywide Gameplay add-ons apply. Trainers will only receive the ticketed event Special Research, Timed Research, and Masterwork Research once.

For the first time ever, a new nighttime event experience at Pokémon GO Tour is available as an add-on to your main event ticket. Mega Night is a ticketed evening event taking place after the main daytime Pokémon GO Tour event. Look forward to unique gameplay, special entertainment, and more during this “after hours” extravaganza!

whatsNew: For the first time in Pokémon GO, Trainers will be able to encounter Shiny Diancie! Trainers attending the in-person event in Tainan can gear up for Masterwork Research that will lead to an encounter with Shiny Diancie—and it’s all included in your event ticket!

This Masterwork Research will also be available as a part of the event ticket for Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Global. Trainers who attend the Tainan event and purchase a global event ticket will only be able to complete this Masterwork Research once, and they will receive additional event-themed rewards instead.
Trainers who attend Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Tainan will be able to encounter some stylish Pikachu wearing Calem’s hat or Serena’s hat. If you’re lucky, you might encounter a Shiny one!
Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Tainan attendees will be able to encounter Shiny Honedge, Shiny Hawlucha, and Shiny Klefki for the first time in Pokémon GO—if they’re lucky!
Purchase the Raid Lover or Egg-thusiast ticket add-ons to maximize your bonuses!

For the first time ever, a new nighttime event experience at Pokémon GO Tour is available as an add-on to your main event ticket. Mega Night is a ticketed evening event taking place after the main daytime Pokémon GO Tour event. Look forward to unique gameplay, special entertainment, and more during this “after hours” extravaganza!
Learn more:Mega Night at Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Tainan

For the first time ever, a new nighttime event experience at Pokémon GO Tour is available as an add-on to your main event ticket. Mega Night is a ticketed evening event taking place after the main daytime Pokémon GO Tour event. Look forward to unique gameplay, special entertainment, and more during this “after hours” extravaganza!
Learn more:Mega Night at Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Tainan
sales: A limited number of Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos T-shirts will be available for purchase at the event! By purchasing a Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos T-shirt in person, you’ll also receive a voucher card with a redemption code for an exclusive matching GO Tour T-shirt avatar item.
Preorders will not be available for Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Tainan. Quantities are limited. No returns or exchanges will be allowed.

whatsNew: For each featured Mega Raid, a short Timed Research will be available. Power up your Pokémon and take on more Mega Raids to earn Premium Battle Passes, Candy, and more! You’ve gotta be quick though—each Timed Research will only be available for a short period of time!

pokemon-go-tour.name: Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Los Angeles 2026
pokemon-go-tour.heading: Pokemon Go Tour

exclusiveBonuses: Attendees will receive the following bonuses and rewards anywhere in Los Angeles County and Orange County during event hours on their ticketed day:
You can make the most of your event day with ticket add-ons! Check out the Raid Lover, Egg-thusiast, and Citywide Gameplay add-ons!

ticketAddOns: Tickets include one day of event gameplay. Attendees may purchase add-ons that extend citywide gameplay for an additional day.

As optional bonuses for attendees, we’re offering several add-ons. Please note: it’s possible to add these to your ticket after your initial order, so if you can’t decide right away, you can always come back to purchase an add-on later!

Extend the GO Tour fun and enjoy a city experience throughout Los Angeles on the extra event day—or days—of your choice! This add-on provides an additional day of the citywide gameplay experience that is available on your primary event day, with a few restrictions.

These add-ons only enable additional citywide gameplay. The Rose Bowl Stadium and Brookside Golf Course event experience is only available on your primary event day at the time indicated on your ticket.
Restrictions for the Citywide Gameplay add-ons apply. Trainers will only receive the ticketed event Special Research, Timed Research, and Masterwork Research once.

Extend the GO Tour fun and enjoy a city experience throughout Los Angeles on the extra event day—or days—of your choice! This add-on provides an additional day of the citywide gameplay experience that is available on your primary event day, with a few restrictions.

These add-ons only enable additional citywide gameplay. The Rose Bowl Stadium and Brookside Golf Course event experience is only available on your primary event day at the time indicated on your ticket.
Restrictions for the Citywide Gameplay add-ons apply. Trainers will only receive the ticketed event Special Research, Timed Research, and Masterwork Research once.

eventInfo.name: Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Los Angeles 2026
eventInfo.location: Rose Bowl Stadium, Los Angeles, United States

whatsNew: For the first time in Pokémon GO, Trainers will be able to encounter Shiny Diancie! Ticket-holding Trainers attending the in-person event in Los Angeles can gear up for Masterwork Research that will lead to an encounter with Shiny Diancie—and it’s all included in your event ticket!

This Masterwork Research will also be available as a part of the event ticket for Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Global. Trainers who attend the Los Angeles event and purchase a global event ticket will only be able to complete this Masterwork Research once, and they will receive additional event-themed rewards instead.
Trainers who attend Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Los Angeles will be able to encounter some stylish Pikachu wearing Calem’s hat or Serena’s hat. If you’re lucky, you might encounter a Shiny one!
Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Los Angeles attendees will be able to encounter Shiny Honedge, Shiny Hawlucha, and Shiny Klefki for the first time in Pokémon GO—if they’re lucky!
Purchase the Raid Lover or Egg-thusiast ticket add-ons and maximize your bonuses!

For the first time ever, we’re excited to offer a new nighttime event experience at Pokémon GO Tour, available to purchase as an add-on to your main event ticket. Mega Night is a ticketed evening event, taking place after the main daytime Pokémon GO Tour event.
Look forward to unique gameplay, special entertainment, and more during this “after hours” extravaganza!
Learn more:Mega Night at Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Los Angeles

For the first time ever, we’re excited to offer a new nighttime event experience at Pokémon GO Tour, available to purchase as an add-on to your main event ticket. Mega Night is a ticketed evening event, taking place after the main daytime Pokémon GO Tour event.
Look forward to unique gameplay, special entertainment, and more during this “after hours” extravaganza!
Learn more:Mega Night at Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Los Angeles
sales: We are thrilled to offer Trainers a wider selection than ever before of apparel and accessories at Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Los Angeles. All items are available via preorder only, and must be picked up at Rose Bowl Stadium during your ticketed event day.
Purchased your ticket already and forgot to add merchandise? No need to worry, you can go back and complete additional purchases for add-ons so long as supplies last.
Quantities are limited, and preorders will only be available while supplies last. No returns, exchanges, or cancellations will be allowed.

We are thrilled to offer Trainers a wider selection than ever before of apparel and accessories at Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Los Angeles. All items are available via preorder only, and must be picked up at Rose Bowl Stadium during your ticketed event day.
Purchased your ticket already and forgot to add merchandise? No need to worry, you can go back and complete additional purchases for add-ons so long as supplies last.
Quantities are limited, and preorders will only be available while supplies last. No returns, exchanges, or cancellations will be allowed.

bonuses: Open up to 40 Gifts per day.
Receive up to 125 Gifts per day from spinning PokéStop and Gym Photo Discs.
Hold up to 10 additional Gifts in your Item Bag.
Additional rewards for completing in-person raids and Max Battles
Open up to 50 Gifts per day.
Receive up to 150 Gifts per day from spinning PokéStop and Gym Photo Discs.
Hold up to 20 additional Gifts in your Item Bag.

masterwork: For US$7.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency), Trainers will receive a Special Research granting a Master Ball as one of the rewards.
Receiving a rare and powerful Master Ball is a special occasion—think wisely about how you’ll use it, and keep a lookout for future opportunities in Pokémon GO to acquire more!

details.goBattleLeague: The GO Battle League returns as part of Precious Paths! Get your Pokémon ready to battle in competitions such as the Holiday Cup, Sunshine Cup, Love Cup, and more! Visit the GO Battle League web page for the schedule and more info!
